properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Stutulu nee karpintunu satatamu Maa prabhuvaa sannutinchedam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gadachi natti kaalamu karunatho nan gaanchitivi Vela lenatti nee krupa choopinatti maa prabhu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naadu dinamu lannitin needu ksemamelunu Needu jaadalanniyun saarambunitchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu mandirambulo melu cheta mammunu Thruptiparachina prabhu stutulu neeke chellunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Needu naama ghanathanu needu prema panulanu Naadhudaa ne paadeda naadu priya prabhuvaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satyaroopi neevegaa sakala srusti karthavu Satatamu mammelumu Halleluya paadedam{/lang-eng}
